content: The theme will be deleted permanently. You will not be able to undo this action.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a warning message when deleting a theme permanently. It appears as part of a modal dialog in the Portal Settings page, prompting the user not to undo the action once confirmed.

usage.context:
return (
 <ModalDialog visible={visible} onClose={onClose} displayType="modal">
 <ModalDialog.Header>
 {t("Settings:DeleteThemeForever")}
 </ModalDialog.Header>
 <ModalDialog.Body>{t("Settings:DeleteThemeNotice")}</ModalDialog.Body>
 <ModalDialog.Footer>
 <StyledFooterContent>
 <Button
 className="delete button-modal"
 label={t("Common:Delete")}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '테마가 영구적으로 삭제됩니다. 그리고 이 작업은 취소할 수 없습니다.' while conveying the general meaning, is slightly clunky and literal. A more natural Korean phrasing would improve the flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 테마가 영구 삭제되며, 복구할 수 없습니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of '그리고' (and) to connect the two sentences feels a bit abrupt. A smoother transition would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 테마가 영구 삭제되며, 복구할 수 없습니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The provided Lao translation is actually Greek. It does not represent a translation of the English content into Lao.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A correct Lao translation is needed. An example would be: ຫົວຂໍ້ຈະຖືກລົບຖອນຢ່າງຖາວອນ ທ່ານຈະບໍ່ສາມາດຍົກເລີກການກະ ທຳ ນີ້ໄດ້

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'şterasă' (deleted) is feminine singular, but 'tema' (theme) is masculine. It should be 'şters' instead.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tema va fi şters definitiv. Această acţiune nu poate fi anulată.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'තේමාව සදහටම මැකෙනු ඇත. මෙම ක්‍රියාමාර්ගය අප්‍රතිවර්ත්‍යයි.' does not accurately convey the meaning of 'The theme will be deleted permanently. You will not be able to undo this action.'. Specifically, 'මෙම ක්‍රියාමාර්ගය අප්‍රතිවර්ත්‍යයි' translates to 'this action is irreversible', which isn't the most natural or clear way to express the idea of not being able to undo the action. It implies a more technical or formal irreversibility.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: තේමාව සදහටම මැකෙනු ඇත. එය නැවත ලබා ගැනීමට බැරිවනු ඇත.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'permanently' is better translated as 'трајно' (trajno) in Serbian (Cyrillic) instead of 'заувек' (zauvek). While 'заувек' is technically correct, 'трајно' conveys the sense of irreversible deletion more accurately in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Тема ће бити обрисана трајно. Нећете моћи да поништите ову радњу.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation uses the feminine form 'obrisana' (deleted - feminine) when referring to 'Tema' (Theme), which is a masculine noun.  This creates a grammatical mismatch.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tema će biti obrisan zauvek. Nećete moći da poništite ovu radnju.
